Why visit Thun when you travel Switzerland: Gorgeous architecture and views all around Explore Thun Castle and see the Thun Panorama Fun surprises like river surfers Nice base for outdoor activities nearby on the lake and otherwise Meiringen Elsewhere in the Bernese Oberland region of Switzerland is a charming and surprising alpine town called Meiringen that’s a must-visit for super fans of Sherlock Holmes… and super fans of meringues. Let me explain! Perhaps the most famous of things to do in Meiringen is visiting the Reichenbach Falls, a series of spectacular waterfalls cascading down a rocky gorge.
